review_data: Reviewed in the United States on August 28, 2021
name: Brianna Saglimbeni
title: Disgusting
review: I don’t know if it’s just me but the plain has the most sour, disgusting flavor. I wish it was vanilla. I love all of the other flavors though 100/10! The plain is -100000/10 though.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2021
name: jayn meinhardt
title: VEGAN and really good
review: Really yummy. And vegan( no need to subsidize the sad dairy industry). And versatile: we use for everything from salad dressing to dessert ((frozen with fruit)

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2021
name: Wn
title: Horrible
review: Horrible taste. Loved the milk, hated the yogurt.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2021
name: Darres Quiles
title: No.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on June 1, 2021
name: Veronica L
title: Wrong substitute
review: This was a substitute which I didn’t want. I don’t like plain yogurt

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 28, 2021
name: Deb
title: Not one of the good Oatly items
review: Love everything else Oatly makes so much! Their oat milk& ice cream are perfection that makes life better. This yogurt, though is not anything I would buy again. The consistency is like wheat pastewe used to use to adhere flyers to lamp poles. They need to go back to revise this item.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on April 22, 2021
name: Emily C.
title: It’s ok, try it at least once
review: I love Oatly but this is too chalky for me. Not awful.. I still ate it, but I wouldn’t buy it again. I was hoping it could be a cream sub in a sauce or dish but it doesn’t work out that way. Oatly needs to bring their heavy cream to the states!

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 15, 2021
name: Emily Charniga
title: Really bad
review: Texture it fine, but that taste it really bad and its surprisingly high in calories.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on March 14, 2021
name: Mary M.
title: Vinegar taste
review: Tastes like oatmilk and vinegar. So far most of the non dairy yogurts I have tried have a vinegar taste, and this one was pretty strong.

review_data: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2020
name: YF Hilton
title: Not a good taste
review: I love oatly so give this yogurt a try, not tasting very good, consistency is good, husband said it taste very oat which not necessary delicious. Not sure about you but I won't buy it again.
